name: Chic Meets Geek
tag_list: san-francisco, silicon-valley, chic, geek, chic-geek, carol-tran, events, red-carpet, tech-conference, entrepreneur, entrepreneurship, startups, high-tech, high-society, socialites, cocktail
overview:
ChicMeetsGeekâ„¢ is an event designed to bridge the social gap between the cultural chic and intellectual geeks. It is similar to a conference, but with a social atmosphere.

The purpose is to gather two different groups in one room to inspire, share, and connect through a panel of geek and chic influential leaders to talk about their inspirational background. A nonprofit beneficiary is highlighted at every ChicMeetsGeekâ„¢ event and themed around the speaker panelists’ expertise to bridge the gap.

ChicMeetsGeekâ„¢ is a user experience. The event presents distinct elements found at a red carpet gala and tech/science conference in one room. The event challenges the attendees with thought-provoking ideas and situations, in order to inspire good.
